text: Humphrey Mijnals (21 December 1930 â€“ 27 July 2019) was a Surinamese-Dutch footballer. He played international football for both the Netherlands and Suriname. He also played 45 times in the Suriname national football team. In 1999, he was elected Surinamese footballer of the century. On 24 August 2008, Mijnals also received Sports Medal of the city of Utrecht. Mijnals died on 27 July 2019 in Utrecht at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Surinamese sportspeople
title: Humphrey Mijnals
